name: axel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of jump in figure skating (= the sport of moving on skates making patterns and jumps) in which the skater jumps with knees bent while facing forwards and lands facing backwards, with one or more turns in the air in between: She began her program with a double axel. Nothing seemed to go right with my routine and I missed the axel.
More examplesFewer examplesTonya Harding was the first American woman to successfully land a triple axel in competition.The defending champion failed to cleanly land the vital combination jump or the double axel and now lies in third place. Even figure-skating fans have to admit the sport's terminology is indecipherable. Does anyone really know the difference between an axel, a lutz and a salchow?
